name: 1. Submit material compliance/test certificates for approval.
Reference documents - R33.2.1, R33.2.2, R33.2.3, R33.2.4
Criteria/Test Method/Spec - RMS 3552, RMS 3553, RMS R63, RMS 3580 MD.R33.A06
Inspection/Test Frequency - In accordance with Annexure R33/L
2. Excavate trench to line, grade, width & depth shown on drawings.
6. Lay pipe on 50mm bed of filter material.
7. Verify that pipe laying, jointing & bedding are complete & conforming
Inspection/Test Frequency - At completion laying, jointing & bedding
8. Backfill pipe with filter material, compact to avoid consolidation & lap geotextile.
9. Install flush point covers and outlet in batter, structure including connections to pits.
Reference documents - R33.4.2, R33.4.3, R33.5.2.1, R33.5.2.2
10. Marking trench drain and submit WAE drawings to Principal <28 days of completion
